summary: A letter from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General to the NYC Office of the Chief Medical Examiner requesting the complete medical examiner's report and all associated files related to the investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein. The letter seeks documentation to aid the OIG's investigation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the death investigation for which the OIG is requesting the complete medical examiner's report and files.

persons.name: Special Agent S
persons.context: The OIG Special Agent to whom the requested medical examiner documentation should be mailed or emailed.

events.title: OIG Request for Epstein Death Investigation Files
events.description: The U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General formally requests the complete medical examiner's report and all associated files from the NYC Office of the Chief Medical Examiner regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

locations: U.S. Bureau of Prisons, Metropolitan Correctional Center New York
U.S. Department of Justice, Office of the Inspector General, 29th Floor, New York, NY 10004
keyFacts: The DOJ Office of the Inspector General was actively investigating Jeffrey Epstein's death as of February 28, 2022.
The OIG requested the complete medical examiner's report, including notes, photos, evidence, x-rays, and all digital files from the NYC Office of the Chief Medical Examiner.
Epstein is identified as an inmate of the Metropolitan Correctional Center New York at the time of his death.
The request indicates an ongoing official inquiry into the circumstances surrounding Epstein's death.
